answers.answer: I have GD but I've never had that happen... When I'm running high I usually go for a walk to work off some sugar. But if I were you I'd call the doctor to be sure it isn't a bigger problem.

question: Ok I am in need of some help please....I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes 2 weeks ago and so far I have been able to keep my sugars within reason.... But for some reason today I woke up with HIGH sugar levels and it just won't go down and I haven't eaten/drank anything with carbs and it just keeps getting higher (slowly) what can I do to make is go down so that I can actually eat something. Baby and I are very hungry
title: gestational diabetes
